[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@microsoft/webpack5-load-themed-styles-loader](./webpack5-load-themed-styles-loader.md) &gt; [ILoadThemedStylesLoaderOptions](./webpack5-load-themed-styles-loader.iloadthemedstylesloaderoptions.md) &gt; [async](./webpack5-load-themed-styles-loader.iloadthemedstylesloaderoptions.async.md)

## ILoadThemedStylesLoaderOptions.async property

If this parameter is set to "true," the "loadAsync" parameter is set to true in the call to loadStyles. Defaults to false.

**Signature:**

```typescript
async?: boolean;
```
